name: Mad Science
description:
Mad Science is a local 2-player competitive multiplayer instagib-deathmatch-platformer game, set in an alternate Cold War, with rival scientists armed to the teeth with particle acceleration weaponry.

Blue Player Controls: Arrow keys [movement], Shift [fire]

Red Player Controls: WASD [movement], Space [fire]

The Windows version can be played in fullscreen by pressing P.

Note: Keyboards which do not feature "n-key rollover" may face some control issues, as multiple buttons have to be pressed simultaneously. Gamepad key mapping programs can be used to play the game with controllers.

You can host this game on your own website, as long as you give a link to this page, and you do not claim it to be your work.
